findings.title: Calling function setMagic() with a new magic_ value can lead to loss of user funds
findings.description: Calling the function `setMagic()` with a new `magic_` address after users had already deposited funds to the old address will result in users not being able to withdraw their deposited funds.

findings.title: Function withdraw() does not give a meaningful error when amountToWithdraw exceeds liquidBalance
findings.description: The function withdraw() will revert if amountToWithdraw exceeds liquidBalance but only provides a generic error message without any meaningful information.
